club_info.name: Google Developer Groups on Campus IET DAVV
club_info.location: IET DAVV, Indore, Madhya Pradesh, India
club_info.mission: To empower future developers by bringing students passionate about technology together and helping them grow their skills in tech, regardless of background.

major_hackathon.name: Hack'Vento 2k26
major_hackathon.description: Hack'Vento is a fully GDG on Campus IET DAVV led hackathon where student developers identify real challenges in their campuses or local communities and build practical solutions using Google technologies.

participation_rules.eligibility: Beginners and experienced developers are both welcome.
participation_rules.solo_participation: No, you must form a team of 4.
participation_rules.gender_rule: No restriction on gender ratio (no mandatory girl member).

challenges: Adaptive Student Time Utilisation & Learning Continuity

past_events.name: Google Cloud Study Jam 2025
past_events.description: A hands-on learning event by Google exploring cloud computing, labs, and skill badges.

past_events.name: First Flight with FlutterFlow
past_events.description: In collaboration with FlutterFlow Developer Groups Indore. Visual app building workshop.

past_events.name: How to crack Google internships and win SIH
